text: Funker Vogt is a German aggrotech band, formed by Gerrit Thomas and Jens KÃ¤stel in 1995. ==Discography== ===Studio Albums=== *Thanks for Nothing (1996) *We Came to Kill (1997) *Killing Time Again (1998) (part new material, part remixes) *Execution Tracks (1998) *Maschine Zeit (2000) *T (2000/2001) (contains 4 new tracks and 10 remixes) *Survivor (2002) *Revivor (2003) (remix album) *Navigator (2005) *Aviator (2007) *Blutzoll (2010) ===Singles=== *Words of Power (1997) *Take Care (1997) *Tragic Hero (1998) *Gunman (2000) *Subspace (2001) *Date of Expiration (2002) *Red Queen (2003) *Fallen Hero (2005) ==Other websites== *Official English site *Official German site *Funker Vogt dot com (English Fansite) *Funker Vogt - "We love provocation !" - Interview Category:German musical groups
title: Funker Vogt
